hero.title: Interviews, media coverage, guest appearances, and milestones.
hero.description: A single place to track external mentions and public highlights. Replace placeholder entries below with verified links as new features are published.

interviews.title: Interview slot available
interviews.note: Add your interview link and a one-line summary.

interviews.title: Creator conversation feature
interviews.note: Highlight topic: political storytelling, campaign coverage, or creator journey.

mediaCoverage.title: Campaign coverage mention
mediaCoverage.note: Document third-party coverage of your on-ground reporting.

guestAppearances: Political event hosting and stage appearances
awards: Add awards, recognitions, or nominations here
Add campaign outcomes or impact highlights

milestones.title: Launched political + IRL storytelling focus
milestones.detail: Positioned the platform around on-ground campaign coverage and public conversations.

milestones.title: Built multi-page campaign-ready website
milestones.detail: Created dedicated pages for booking, volunteer onboarding, media portfolio, and field journal updates.
